title: Norwich close in on signing Aberdeen's Kenny McLean
description: Aberdeen midfielder Kenny McLean is having a medical at Norwich after a deal was agreed between the two clubs.
content: Sky Sports News understands the fee is in the region of Â£200,000 and the player could be loaned back to Aberdeen until the end of this season.McLean has made 29 appearances in all competitions for Aberdeen this term, scoring four goals and contributing two assists.The former St Mirren midfielder has two Scotland caps to his name, with his last international appearance coming in last September's 1-0 loss to the Netherlands in September.
